inclusion.criterion: Primary diagnosis: eating disorder according to DSM IV Criteria
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Participated in at least three failed specialized eating disorder treatments
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient has tried several treatments

inclusion.criterion: Having the mental capacity to make provide informed consent to research participation
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient is a 60 year old man

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Examination shows bilateral swellings around the molars

notes: The patient has a confirmed diagnosis of Paget's Disease of Bone and is starting Bisphosphonate therapy.
